Description: Here is an awesome 1986 Steinberger XP2 bass that comes with the original soft case, allen key, and strap! The serial number N3468 indicates it being made in Newburgh, NY around 1986 based on the serial info found online. It can get thumpy P bass tones all the way to musicman type modern tones with the active EMGs. It sounds great and is all original. I changed out the D string last night from an original set of steinberger strings and will include the remaining 3 strings so you can change out the other 3 to match. I currently have the action set up a tad higher where I prefer so you may or may not want to setup to your tastes. The condition is great including some surface checking throughout, emg logos are faded from age, and a z shaped light gouge on the back shown in the picture with the orange pick. I am not sure if this qualifies as the XP2 or XP2A model being that it does take a 9v battery so I would assume this is active though have read the pickups are active but the tone may be passive. In messaging another user I also noticed a line on the outside of the neck pocket that is not a crack it just appears to be worn through perhaps by a strap. I included a flash high resolution picture to illustrate as well as pics of the neck relief. I am also selling a 2nd steinberger xp2 in a different auction so if you miss out on this auction, you have a fallback! Happy Bidding! https://rover.ebay.com/rover/0/0/0?mpre=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.ebay.com%2Fulk%2Fitm%2F273655019767
Title: Vintage 1986 Steinberger XP2 Bass Guitar
